title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.35 - Vehicle refueling-rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.35 - Vehicle refueling-rules

State Regulations
(a) Vehicles and equipment using gasoline or diesel oil as fuel shall be refueled
from: (1)
U.L. approved safety cans fitted
with a flexible spout for easy pouring, or
(2)
approved underground storage and
dispensing systems. (b) Any other method of refueling must be approved by the
manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
